Articles.Content:
so i keep crashing

here what I'm working on https://www.dropbox.com/s/pi5wkk6zficnkbs/%20Jool%20ONE%20MKI.craft?dl=0 it will crash with in 15 mins iv tried to remake the same thing on a clean install with and with out MODS this is a Vanilla install no mods.

My Player.log is empty but i do have theses not sure if they will help.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/hcqtxrkho5usd2f/Ksp%20Mac%20crash%20log%20.rtf?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/qs8omh1t2um3yeb/KSP_2015-01-03-000218_justinesmac.wakeups_resource.diag?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/wdjfgt224jiyaqi/KSP_2015-01-10-012608_justinesmac%20copy.crash?dl=0

Player.log is empty? That's unusual. Can you check your permissions are set correctly for KSP, as detailed in the Stock Support stickied thread?

Apart from that... crashes ought to be generating their own log files from within the Unity environment, which are typically dumped somewhere around the KSP folder. You're looking for copies of your Player.log, the error.log and crash.dump files in there, though only the first two are particularly useful to us here.

Ok so i tried again a few time and had to run the console at the same time to get the players log to generate so here it is i did this on a new fresh game file

https://www.dropbox.com/s/n1ke0esl4he5cvt/Player%20copy.log?dl=0

Edited January 10, 2015 by MissMolly

so i tried rebuilding this ship again take care and time what I'm doing, and what iv done up to the crash. so i think the crash is linked to Cloned parts as my first Part the was cloned i got this Part Warning: part MK1Fuselage is not a child of MK1Fuselage (only 22 parts at this point)i stopped cloning and had no problem. till i cloned Ox Stat Solar Panels on to Kerbodyne se 14400 tank and tried to do a 4x symmetry and well I'm here again hope this helps.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/dutcgt0pukoxfau/Player.log?dl=0
